title: Savage Lands 0.8.3.28
description:
*******************************************************************************
                        Savage Lands (0.8.3.28)
*******************************************************************************

Savage Lands is a gritty, brutal, first-person open-world fantasy survival experience in which players have only one goal: Stay Alive. Explore a world where days and nights are spent slaughtering vicious creatures, gathering scarce resources, building shelter and crafting powerful weapons needed to survive. Every decision counts, because one mistake can lead to an unfortunate encounter with death's cold embrace.

This version includes the new islands of Tarvhas

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                         General informations
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Game type: Simulation, Action, Adventure
Language: English
Creators: Signal Studios, DigitalDNA Games LLC
Size: 1.10 GB
Year: 2016
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                         Minimum configuration
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OS: Windows 7 SP1/8/10
CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHZ or AMD Athlon x2 2.0 GHZ
Ram: 4 GB
GPU: Intel HD 4000, NVIDIA GeForce GT 430, ATI Radeon HD 6450 or better
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive: 2 GB
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                       Recommended configuration
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OS: Windows 7 SP1/8.1/10
CPU: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X4 940 or better
Ram: 4 GB
GPU: GeForce GTX 560, Intel HD 5000, Radeon HD 7750 with 1 GB or better
DirectX: Version 10
Hard Drive: 2 GB
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                            Installation
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Just simply run the installation program (Savage Lands Setup.exe), 
install the game and play.

Enjoy!
